name: BUSttle
excerpt: So you don't have to hustle
product: Busttle is an eco-friendly ride sharing app

name: ScholarDeck
product: ScholarDeck is a one-stop online platform for all students in Malaysia to easily search and apply for scholarships. Scholar Deck also offers all students a smarter way to discover scholarships in Malaysia via a personalised scholarship newsletter.

name: MakanSharing
excerpt: E-Commerce Marketplace That Brings Food Lovers Together
product: MakanSharing.com is an online e-commerce marketplace that brings food lovers, from budding chefs and home cooks to gastronomes, together in a private kitchen & dining space. Our vision is to connect food lovers with one another; remove barriers of entry to the culinary business; providing opportunities to home cooks and budding chefs who would otherwise never have a chance to showcase their culinary creations; rewarding food lovers who are passionate about being the first to try and review the latest gourmet experiences.

name: KidzGEM
product: Kidzgem aims to color up moments of parenting and reach out a host of FUN art & craft activities to our users. We pledge to provide utmost convenience to parent to capture each sentimental moment, always feed in new creative contents for quality bonding time and partner with parents to cultivate creative confidence within their child. Together let us celebrate the wonders of sweet creative moments!

name: MoneyMatch
excerpt: Mobile Peer to Peer Currency Exchange Community Platform
product: MoneyMatch employs technology to bridge the gap and connect individuals that need to exchange foreign currency. MoneyMatch intend to do this by creating an online platform that will allow individuals to buy or sell currencies amongst themselves therefore eliminating the middle man. MoneyMatch's vision is to exploit inefficiencies within the current financial system, disintermediate the industry and liberate the consumer.

name: LYL
excerpt: Providing Best Content To The Migrants
product: LYL Technology is a Malaysian technology start-up, mainly focusing on producing innovative mobile apps for the emerging migrant market in Malaysia & Singapore. To provide the best content to the migrants, LYL has partnered with many content providers, music labels, radio and television channels from Indonesia, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Nepal, Bhutan, India & Philippine, to provide highly personalized content to the specific segment. LYL is committed to enrich the lifestyle of migrants by providing newer services and content specially designed for them.

name: DEXT
product: DEXT is an on demand mobile app platform for customers to obtain financial services. The search of financial services include personal financing, credit cards , insurance and unit trust. With DEXT, customer can easily have access to the financial services by personalising and specifying the requirements by selecting the desired financial advisor by location, rating, product characteristics and experience.

name: TheLorry
excerpt: Simple And Effortless Lorry ("Lori Sewa") Booking Website
product:
The Lorry is a simple and effortless lorry ("Lori Sewa") booking website.

Gone are the days where you have to spend precious hours looking up and comparing quotes from lorry providers. With The Lorry, you will get at least 5 quotes from different providers in under 30 seconds. It is that simple.

We partner with reputable and experienced lorry providers to ensure that your goods will be transported safely and securely to your final destination.

Try it out now to experience a new and fresh way to book lorries in Malaysia.
